I don't know, but\""},{"lineNumber":40020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあいい。サクッと倒して恩を売ってやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, whatever. I'll quickly beat him and earn some credit."},{"lineNumber":40021,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガンジーなんぞに活躍させるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't let some Gandhi steal the spotlight.\""},{"lineNumber":40022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ……どっちに行きますか、ランス様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So... which way shall we go, Lord Lance?"},{"lineNumber":40023,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人の魔人の……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Of the two demons...\""},{"lineNumber":40024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずは大食い野郎だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First, that gluttonous bastard."},{"lineNumber":40025,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やつを叩き潰さん限り、","translatedEnglishLine":"Until we crush him,"},{"lineNumber":40026,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここにいる間、メシもロクに食えん」","translatedEnglishLine":"we won't be able to eat properly while here.\""},{"lineNumber":40027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ……東部ね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then... the east."},{"lineNumber":40028,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元来た道を戻る感じになるのかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I guess we'll be going back the way we came.\""},{"lineNumber":40029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなるかな。魔軍の勢力圏内を避けて……ここ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Probably. Avoiding the demon army's territory... here."},{"lineNumber":40030,"originalJapaneseLine":"　東部戦線の司令部に合流するのが良いと思うわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think it's best to join the Eastern Front's headquarters.\""},{"lineNumber":40031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勢力圏外と言っても、魔軍の哨戒はあると思う。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though it's outside their territory, I believe the demon army has patrols."},{"lineNumber":40032,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捕捉されるとまずいから、注意して」","translatedEnglishLine":"It'll be bad if we're spotted, so be careful.\""},{"lineNumber":40033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなもんは斬り破るから問題ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We'll slash through that, so no problem."},{"lineNumber":40034,"originalJapaneseLine":"　で、東部の司令部って誰がいるんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, who is at the Eastern Headquarters?\""},{"lineNumber":40035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「炎軍と氷軍。サイアスとウスピラよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Flame Army and the Ice Army. Saias and Uspira.\""},{"lineNumber":40036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「キザキザ野郎とウスピラちゃんか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That pretentious guy and Uspira, huh."},{"lineNumber":40037,"originalJapaneseLine":"　野郎は要らんが、ウスピラはいいな。良かろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't need that guy, but Uspira's good. Sounds good.\""},{"lineNumber":40038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........................\""},{"lineNumber":40039,"originalJapaneseLine":"僅かな休憩の後、出発するランス達を、","translatedEnglishLine":"After a brief rest, Magic came to see off Lance and the others as they departed."},{"lineNumber":40040,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは街の入口まで見送りに来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"She came all the way to the town's entrance to see them off."},{"lineNumber":40041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、こんな所まで。一緒に来るのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, all the way here? Are you coming with us?\""},{"lineNumber":40042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……無理よ。親父が居ない以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Impossible. Since Father isn't here,"},{"lineNumber":40043,"originalJapaneseLine":"　国王代理でいなきゃならないもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have to stay as the acting king.\""},{"lineNumber":40044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか、じゃあな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, then goodbye."},{"lineNumber":40045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　首を長くして待ってるがいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll be waiting eagerly for you.\""},{"lineNumber":40046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………死なないでよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Don't die.\""},{"lineNumber":40047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは！　なんだしおらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha! How tame of you."},{"lineNumber":40048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前には似合わないぞ、そういうの」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's not like you at all.\""},{"lineNumber":40049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ！　ばっ、ばかっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha! You idiot!"},{"lineNumber":40050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　し、心配、してるのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm worried about you, you know...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不快げに眉をひそめたランスに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Lance, who frowned in displeasure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは視線を逸らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic averted her gaze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今日はまだいい方よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Today is still one of the better ones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いたぶられて、心を砕かれて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tormented, heartbroken...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間が、泣き叫びながら殺されていく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Comrades being killed while crying and screaming."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までの放送の分を思い出しているのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps recalling the previous broadcasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは口元を押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic covered her mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……混乱は、どんどん広がってるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The chaos is spreading more and more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ出す子も多いし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many children are running away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選ばれたら自殺してる子さえいる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are even children committing suicide when chosen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「士官がそれじゃ、堪らんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If even the officers are like that, it's unbearable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦況は、辛うじて支えてるけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The battle situation is barely holding,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは今、ゆっくりと蝕まれてるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Zeth is slowly being consumed now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「飢えと恐怖か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hunger and fear, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国を揺さぶり、滅ぼすには、なかなか効果的だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are quite effective in shaking and destroying a country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「首都が落ちる前も、別の街から放送があったの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even before the capital fell, there was a broadcast from another town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父は怒り狂ってたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Father was furious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まあ、そうだろうな。あの性格じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, I suppose so. With that personality."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのまま、首都放棄を言い残して旅に出たわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He just left after saying to abandon the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからは、ここに帰っても来ずに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And after that, he never returned here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死んだか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is he dead?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人の父親を勝手に殺さないでよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't go killing someone else's father on your own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激昂したマジックの視線に、強い苛立ちがこもる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Magic's furious gaze was a strong irritation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……時々、便りが来るし、生きてるわよ……たぶん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sometimes we get word from him, so he's alive... probably."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、それも束の間、すぐに表情は沈む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that was short-lived, and her expression quickly darkened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、まあ図体だけは頑丈だからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, well, his body alone is sturdy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、どうやって魔人を殺すつもりだ、あいつ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But how does he intend to kill a demon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは…………わからない、けど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That... I don't know, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあいい。サクッと倒して恩を売ってやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, whatever. I'll quickly beat him and earn some credit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーなんぞに活躍させるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let some Gandhi steal the spotlight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ……どっちに行きますか、ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So... which way shall we go, Lord Lance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の魔人の……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of the two demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずは大食い野郎だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, that gluttonous bastard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やつを叩き潰さん限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we crush him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにいる間、メシもロクに食えん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we won't be able to eat properly while here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃ……東部ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then... the east.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元来た道を戻る感じになるのかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess we'll be going back the way we came."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなるかな。魔軍の勢力圏内を避けて……ここ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably. Avoiding the demon army's territory... here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東部戦線の司令部に合流するのが良いと思うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it's best to join the Eastern Front's headquarters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勢力圏外と言っても、魔軍の哨戒はあると思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though it's outside their territory, I believe the demon army has patrols.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕捉されるとまずいから、注意して」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll be bad if we're spotted, so be careful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなもんは斬り破るから問題ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We'll slash through that, so no problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、東部の司令部って誰がいるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, who is at the Eastern Headquarters?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「炎軍と氷軍。サイアスとウスピラよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Flame Army and the Ice Army. Saias and Uspira."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キザキザ野郎とウスピラちゃんか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That pretentious guy and Uspira, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野郎は要らんが、ウスピラはいいな。良かろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't need that guy, but Uspira's good. Sounds good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僅かな休憩の後、出発するランス達を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a brief rest, Magic came to see off Lance and the others as they departed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは街の入口まで見送りに来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She came all the way to the town's entrance to see them off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、こんな所まで。一緒に来るのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, all the way here? Are you coming with us?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……無理よ。親父が居ない以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Impossible. Since Father isn't here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国王代理でいなきゃならないもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to stay as the acting king."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか、じゃあな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, then goodbye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首を長くして待ってるがいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll be waiting eagerly for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………死なないでよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Don't die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　なんだしおらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! How tame of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前には似合わないぞ、そういうの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not like you at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ！　ばっ、ばかっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha! You idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: し、心配、してるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I'm worried about you, you know..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Since Father isn't here,"},{"lineNumber":40043,"originalJapaneseLine":"　国王代理でいなきゃならないもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have to stay as the acting king.\""},{"lineNumber":40044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか、じゃあな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, then goodbye."},{"lineNumber":40045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　首を長くして待ってるがいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll be waiting eagerly for you.\""},{"lineNumber":40046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………死なないでよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Don't die.\""},{"lineNumber":40047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは！　なんだしおらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha! How tame of you."},{"lineNumber":40048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前には似合わないぞ、そういうの」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's not like you at all.\""},{"lineNumber":40049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ！　ばっ、ばかっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha! You idiot!"},{"lineNumber":40050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　し、心配、してるのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm worried about you, you know...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不快げに眉をひそめたランスに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Lance, who frowned in displeasure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは視線を逸らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic averted her gaze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今日はまだいい方よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Today is still one of the better ones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いたぶられて、心を砕かれて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tormented, heartbroken...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間が、泣き叫びながら殺されていく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Comrades being killed while crying and screaming."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までの放送の分を思い出しているのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps recalling the previous broadcasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは口元を押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic covered her mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……混乱は、どんどん広がってるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The chaos is spreading more and more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ出す子も多いし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many children are running away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選ばれたら自殺してる子さえいる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are even children committing suicide when chosen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「士官がそれじゃ、堪らんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If even the officers are like that, it's unbearable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦況は、辛うじて支えてるけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The battle situation is barely holding,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは今、ゆっくりと蝕まれてるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Zeth is slowly being consumed now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「飢えと恐怖か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hunger and fear, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国を揺さぶり、滅ぼすには、なかなか効果的だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are quite effective in shaking and destroying a country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「首都が落ちる前も、別の街から放送があったの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even before the capital fell, there was a broadcast from another town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親父は怒り狂ってたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Father was furious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まあ、そうだろうな。あの性格じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, I suppose so. With that personality."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのまま、首都放棄を言い残して旅に出たわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He just left after saying to abandon the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからは、ここに帰っても来ずに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And after that, he never returned here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死んだか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is he dead?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人の父親を勝手に殺さないでよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't go killing someone else's father on your own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激昂したマジックの視線に、強い苛立ちがこもる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Magic's furious gaze was a strong irritation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……時々、便りが来るし、生きてるわよ……たぶん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sometimes we get word from him, so he's alive... probably."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、それも束の間、すぐに表情は沈む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that was short-lived, and her expression quickly darkened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、まあ図体だけは頑丈だからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, well, his body alone is sturdy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、どうやって魔人を殺すつもりだ、あいつ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But how does he intend to kill a demon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは…………わからない、けど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That... I don't know, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあいい。サクッと倒して恩を売ってやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, whatever. I'll quickly beat him and earn some credit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーなんぞに活躍させるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let some Gandhi steal the spotlight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ……どっちに行きますか、ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So... which way shall we go, Lord Lance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の魔人の……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of the two demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずは大食い野郎だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, that gluttonous bastard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やつを叩き潰さん限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we crush him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにいる間、メシもロクに食えん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we won't be able to eat properly while here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃ……東部ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then... the east.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元来た道を戻る感じになるのかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guess we'll be going back the way we came."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなるかな。魔軍の勢力圏内を避けて……ここ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably. Avoiding the demon army's territory... here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東部戦線の司令部に合流するのが良いと思うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it's best to join the Eastern Front's headquarters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勢力圏外と言っても、魔軍の哨戒はあると思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though it's outside their territory, I believe the demon army has patrols.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕捉されるとまずいから、注意して」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll be bad if we're spotted, so be careful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなもんは斬り破るから問題ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We'll slash through that, so no problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、東部の司令部って誰がいるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, who is at the Eastern Headquarters?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「炎軍と氷軍。サイアスとウスピラよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Flame Army and the Ice Army. Saias and Uspira."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キザキザ野郎とウスピラちゃんか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That pretentious guy and Uspira, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野郎は要らんが、ウスピラはいいな。良かろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't need that guy, but Uspira's good. Sounds good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僅かな休憩の後、出発するランス達を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a brief rest, Magic came to see off Lance and the others as they departed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは街の入口まで見送りに来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She came all the way to the town's entrance to see them off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、こんな所まで。一緒に来るのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, all the way here? Are you coming with us?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……無理よ。親父が居ない以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Impossible. Since Father isn't here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国王代理でいなきゃならないもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to stay as the acting king."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか、じゃあな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, then goodbye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首を長くして待ってるがいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll be waiting eagerly for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………死なないでよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Don't die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　なんだしおらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! How tame of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前には似合わないぞ、そういうの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not like you at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ！　ばっ、ばかっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha! You idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: し、心配、してるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I'm worried about you, you know..."
